description: Something is wrong with the Avatars at Fumizuki Academy; the beings aren`t just acting weird, they look a lot different too. Luckily, Yoshii might be able to solve the problem.

titles.title: Bousou to Meikyuu to Shoukanjuu Hokan Keikaku
Fúria, Labirinto E Seres De Projetos Instrumentais!
Recklessness, Labyrinths, and the Avatar Instrumentality Project
暴走と迷宮と召喚獣補完計画
